title: How to write a blog post without typing in MS Word - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey there, Don't worry! The answer is pretty easy :) Well, you type in MS word and then copy paste your article or blog in the post section. What you can do here is, directly type your topic in the new post section and save it as a draft before you publish it :) That's all… Did I help? Good luck :)
